content: **happy lys day 2025 ** ///// be sure to stop in your local yarn shop to celebrate the big day we are excited to celebrate lys day with a free pattern in fino and our newest fino mini-skein kit greta 1 with one skein of fino and one fino mini-skein kit make 3 cowls one cowl uses 2 of the five colors of the mini-skein kit so you can play with the colors across the 3 cowls ///// size - 29 circumference x 13 tall materials manos del uruguay fino 70% extrafine merino 30% silk approx 100g / 490 yds 1 skip mc plus 1 mini-skein kit shown in 404 watered silk mc with #29 greta 457 brocade 464 dog-rose 466 tassel 444 topsy-turvy 455 elixir us 7/ 4 5mm needle 24 circular waste yarn and/or crochet hook for provisional cast-on spare circular needle gauge size or smaller removable stitch marker tapestry needle gauge 20 sts and 36 row = 4 in lace pattern 1 https //fairmountfibers com/products/fino-mini-skeins
